publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4919 Sarah Boyack: Congratulations to David Rintoul, Winner of the Sir William Y Darling Award for Good Citizenship—That the Parliament congratulates David Rintoul on winning the Sir William Y Darling Award for Good Citizenship and thanks him for his good work helping the community in Tollcross through the Tollcross Traders Association and Tollcross Community Council and running various local websites such as Tollcross Online.

S3M-4919 Sarah Boyack: Congratulations to David Rintoul, Winner of the Sir William Y Darling Award for Good Citizenship—That the Parliament congratulates David Rintoul on winning the Sir William Y Darling Award for Good Citizenship and thanks him for his good work helping the community in Tollcross through the Tollcross Traders Association and Tollcross Community Council and running various local websites such as Tollcross Online.
